titleStmt.title: Traces of lines from Iliad 1; maybe a writing exercise

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: no need for verso tags (this should be in the metadata); add lost.?lin to top and bottom; renumber beginning with 1.; articulate ἐμ̣[ή]ν̣[ιε in l. 2; add dots to μ̣έλιτο̣ς in l. 4; vestig.1char should be .1 in l.6; add commentary note to l. 6 that the readings are not compatible with Iliad 1.251; add (?) to reg tags in l.7; articulate Ἀχαι[ΐδα in l. 9; separate μέγακεν in l. 11; add a space after the apostrophe in final line. META: delete volume number from biblio 14433; change ‘book’ in dropdown menu of 50133 to ‘number’; update Berlin image link (https://berlpap.smb.museum/04346/); remove Homer and Ilias from keywords; add CWKB numbers for Homer (927) and Iliad (2815); Pleiades georef for Arsinoites is (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736893); add verso to inventory number.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: no need for verso tags (this should be in the metadata); add lost.?lin to top and bottom; renumber beginning with 1.; articulate ἐμ̣[ή]ν̣[ιε in l. 2; add dots to μ̣έλιτο̣ς in l. 4; vestig.1char should be .1 in l.6; add commentary note to l. 6 that the readings are not compatible with Iliad 1.251; add (?) to reg tags in l.7; articulate Ἀχαι[ΐδα in l. 9; separate μέγακεν in l. 11; add a space after the apostrophe in final line.
